targets.expr: node_load1{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"} / on(node) group_left() node_cpu_count{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node", type="logical"}
node_load5{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"} / on(node) group_left() node_cpu_count{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node", type="logical"}
node_load15{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"} / on(node) group_left() node_cpu_count{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node", type="logical"}

((node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"} - node_memory_SwapFree_bytes{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"}) / node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"}) * 100 or on(node) (0 * node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{job="proxmox-nodes", node=~"$node"})
